channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investors Bet Trump Will Make Europe Investable Again
item.description: The big hope is that Europe will move faster to implement reforms in the face of competitive threats from the U.S.

item.title: American Airlines shares tumble as outlook falls short
item.description: American forecast a wider than expected loss for the first quarter, sending shares lower.

item.title: Dollar's Falls After Trump's Tariff Remarks Could Prove Limited
item.description: The dollar was lower but its decline could prove to be limited after President Trump said he’d prefer not to impose new tariffs on China.

item.title: MicroStrategy Suddenly Has a Tax Problem, and Needs Help From Trump's IRS
item.description: New rules could tax unrealized gains on bitcoin holdings at large companies.

item.title: Burberry shares jump 13% after better-than-expected quarterly sales
item.description: Burberry on Friday reported a shallower-than-expected dip in sales in the fiscal third quarter, in the first glimpse of fresh efforts to revamp the be...

item.title: Boeing expects $4 billion loss for fourth quarter after chaotic 2024
item.description: Boeing outlined expected results and charges across its business in preliminary fourth-quarter results.

item.title: Base Metal Prices Rise; Copper Hits 10-Week Highs on Weaker Dollar
item.description: Base metal prices rose, with copper sitting at 10-week highs as the U.S. dollar weakened overnight on Trump’s comments.

item.title: Stock Futures Mixed With Amex, Verizon Earnings in Spotlight
item.description: U.S. stock futures wobbled while markets in China and Europe made gains.

item.title: EA shares plunge 19%, on track for worst day since dot-com bubble
item.description: Electronic Arts shares plummeted on Thursday after the video game publisher cut its forecast, due largely to challenges with its soccer franchise.

item.title: Twilio stock surges after company issues optimistic 2027 profit forecast
item.description: Twilio wants to grow in conversational artificial intelligence while also becoming more profitable.
